text:
[Verse]
Day turns to night
Stars in the sky
City lights shine
Underneath we fly

[Verse 2]
Whispers in the breeze
Moonlight so bright
Wandering with ease
Dreams take flight

[Chorus]
Twilight dreams
In our hearts tonight
Twilight dreams
Everything feels right

[Verse 3]
Footsteps on the sand
Waves crashing near
Holding your hand
No need to fear

[Bridge]
Endless journey
Clear
Through the night
We steer
Finding what we seek
In twilight's mystique

[Chorus]
Twilight dreams
In our hearts tonight
Twilight dreams
Everything feels right
title: Twilight Dreams
